mapper.update: update hz_lore set lore_name = #{loreName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, course_id = #{courseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creator_id = #{creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creator_name = #{creatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, lore_name, course_id, sort, remarks, creator_id, creator_name, create_time, is_delete from hz_lore where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select id, lore_name, course_id, sort, remarks, creator_id, creator_name, create_time, is_delete from hz_lore
